jade.util
Class Dice

java.lang.Object
  jade.util.Dice

public class Dice
extends java.lang.Object

A pseudo-random number generator using the Mersenne Twister algorithm as presented on Wikipedia.

Field Summary

          A global instance of Dice, for use when a unique instance of Dice is not required.

rollXdY

public final int rollXdY(int x,
                         int y)
Returns the sum of an xdy dice roll. In other words, x y-sided dice are rolled, and their sum is returned.

Parameters:
x - the number of dice
y - the number of sides on each dice
Returns:
the result of an xdy dice roll
